content: >this pattern can also be found on payhip 1 with pay what you want option the merenkulkija sock pattern is a basic cabled design for worsted and dk weight sock yarns the instructions include two different cable patterns the english download is a revised and extended version of the original pattern published in 2011 >ohje suomeksi ullassa 3/11 2 huomaathan että suomenkielisessä ohjeessa on vain yksi koko ___ **pattern features ** - knitted cuff down - instructions written in metric and us terminology - instructions written for magic loop but dpns can be used as well - four sizes small 44 sts medium 48 sts large 52 sts and extra-large 56 sts - heel flap and round heel turn - charts but no written instructions for the cables - two alternative cable patterns available - the revised pattern hasn t been proof read or test knitted 1 https //payhip com/b/j4wmy 2 http //www ullaneule net/0311/ohjeet_merenkulkija html
